days.text: Temperature falling. Cold and dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 4 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 4 to 5 east to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5.
